mihomo A simple python pydantic model type hint and autocompletion support for Honkai: Star Rail parsed data from the Mihomo API. API url: https://api.mihomo.me/srinfoparsed/UID?lang=LANG Installation Usage Basic There are two parsed data formats: - V1: - URL: https://api.mihomo.me/srinfoparsed/800333171?lang=en&version=v1 - Fetching: use - Data model: - All models defined in directory. - V2: - URL: https://api.mihomo.me/srinfoparsed/800333171?lang=en - Fetching: use - Data model: - All models defined in directory. If you don't want to use to get the image url everytime, you can use to get the parsed data with asset urls. Example Tools Remove Duplicate Character Merge Character Data Data Persistence Take pickle and json as an example
